message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $120?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I see. Perhaps we could aim for a price closer to my budget. Would $130 be acceptable to you?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $140, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Considering my budget, would it be possible to settle at $130?
